changeSet.author: frolov
changeSet.sql: CREATE EVENT delete_test ON SCHEDULE EVERY 1 DAY STARTS TIMESTAMP(CURRENT_DATE + INTERVAL 1 HOUR) DO DELETE FROM TEST t JOIN TEST_SUITE ts ON t.test_suite_id = ts.id JOIN PROJECT p ON ts.project_id = p.id WHERE 1 = 1 AND p.type = 'git' AND DATEDIFF(NOW(), t.DATE_ADDED) >= 30;

changeSet.author: frolov
changeSet.sql: CREATE EVENT delete_test_execution ON SCHEDULE EVERY 1 DAY STARTS TIMESTAMP(CURRENT_DATE) DO DELETE FROM TEST_EXECUTION WHERE DATEDIFF(NOW(), END_TIME) >= 30;
